title: Absol

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Night Slash**: Deal a Basic attack to someone. 20% chance of being an Unstoppable attack instead.
- **Future Sight**: Choose up to three players. The next night, you may deal an Astral Powerful attack to one of them. (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Anyone initially targeted by Future Sight will be notified and be unable to perform any abilities for the next day and night out of fear. 
- **Super Luck**: You cannot be targeted by any negative RNG elements.

desc:
Post 2481
*Absol appears to humans in an attempt to warn them of upcoming disasters or catastrophes. It was thought that Absol actually caused these disasters, and was banished from the town as a result.*
